name: Improved Wrath
baseDescription: Reduces the cast time of your Wrath spell by 0.1 sec.

name: Nature's Grasp
baseDescription: While active, any time an enemy strikes the caster they have a 35% chance to become afflicted by Entangling Roots.

name: Improved Nature's Grasp
baseDescription: Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by 15%.

name: Improved Entangling Roots
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your Entangling Roots spell by 10%.

name: Improved Moonfire
baseDescription: Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by 5%.

name: Natural Weapons
baseDescription: Increases the damage you deal with physical attacks by 10%.

name: Natural Shapeshifter
baseDescription: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 10%.

name: Improved Thorns
baseDescription: Increases the damage caused by your Thorns spell by 25%.

name: Omen of Clarity
baseDescription: Imbues the druid with natural energy. Each of the druid's melee attacks has a chance of causing the caster to enter a Clearcasting state.

name: Nature's Reach
baseDescription: Increases the range of your Balance spells and Faerie Fire by 10%.

name: Vengeance
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 20%.

name: Improved Starfire
baseDescription: Reduces the cast time of your Starfire spell by 0.5 sec and has a 5% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

name: Nature's Grace
baseDescription: All spell criticals grace you with a blessing of nature, reducing the casting time of your next spell by 0.5 sec.

name: Moonglow
baseDescription: Reduces the Mana cost of your Moonfire, Starfire, Wrath, Healing Touch, and Rejuvenation spells by 3%.

name: Moonfury
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your Starfire, Moonfire and Wrath spells by 10%.

name: Moonkin Form
baseDescription: Transforms the Druid into Moonkin Form. While in this form the armor contribution from items is increased by 360%, all party members within 30 yards have their spell critical chance increased by 3%, and the druid gains 150% increased attack power.
